mapper.insert: insert into post(categoryid, userid, title, content) values(107, #{userid}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: select *, date_format(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') fmtdate from post where categoryid = 107 and userid = #{userid} order by regdate desc
